Uses of Package
game

Classes in game used by game
BoardMatrix
           
BoardMatrix.Cell
           
BoardMatrix.Direction
           
BoardMatrix.Position
           
BoardMatrix.Size
           
Game.Player
          The two players playing the Game, black and white, plus a case for cells that are not owned.
Game.State
          The various state the Game might be in, based on the most recent event that has occurred: WAITING_FOR_PLAYER if the first player has just joined. PLAYER_JOINED if the second player has just joined. MOVE_SUCCESS if the most recent move order was successful. MOVE_FAILURE if the most recent move order was illegal. NO_CHANGE if the last access to the structure wasn't a move order. VICTORY if the current player has just won the game. DEFEAT if the current player has just won the game. DRAW if the current player just drew the game.
MorpionRules
           
ReversiRules
           
Rules
